revised_title: The Influence of Tartrate of Ammonia and Carbonate of Ammonia on Urine Acidity
tldr: Henry Bence Jones investigates the effects of tartrate of ammonia and carbonate of ammonia on urine acidity. He finds that tartrate of ammonia has no significant impact on urine acidity, while carbonate of ammonia slightly reduces it. The study highlights the differences between the actions of volatile and fixed alkalis on urine acidity.
